name: Nusvg
author: nuweb

sections.description:
Nusvg plugin allows you to manage parametrable SVG files and retrieve them with parameters.

Features

  • Custom parameters can be passed to image (i. e. width, height, color…)
  • Images can be retrieved in HTML format or as a base64 string

nusvg.pot file available
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page

You will find ‘Nusvg’ menu in your WordPress admin panel
sections.faq:
Nusvg Needs Your Support

It is hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you. If you enjoy using Nusvg and find it useful, please consider making a donation. Your donation will help encourage and support the plugin’s continued development and better user support.

Can I change the plugin code?

Yes. Thank you for submitting your changes to update the plugin.

Image don’t show

Make sure your upload directory is writable.

short_description: SVG image manager. PHP methods are available in order to retrieve images with parameters.
